frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Israel
frontmatter.venue: East TLV Meitav St 13, Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on June 21st live in Tel Aviv, Israel
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held in-person and all talks will be delivered live. As always, our focus is on creating a welcoming and inclusive space for peer-to-peer interactions online. This Gathering will focus on talks from and by Cloud Native practitioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: All times are in Israel Daylight Time (IDT)

schedule.session_name: Key Note: Realizing value from AI/ML - Increasing velocity and consistency through MLOps
Vision to Action (Edge, Data, Multi-cloud, Observability)
Automating the Orchestration of Small-Factor Kubernetes Edge Clusters
Never Go Limitless: On the Importance of ResourceQuotas at the Edge
Boost Productivity and Cut Costs with OpenShift Hosted Control Planes
Managing OCP Clusters in Scale - ACM and GitOps
OpenShift Data Science as an Enabler for Clinical Research
Modernization Strategies to Bring Your Apps to the Cloud
The Next AI Frontier: Foundation Models for Business
Closing & Reception — Raffle Draw & Live Q/A with Red Hat Engineers & Project Leads at Red Hat Booth in Expo Hall
